content.detailedDescription: I was up late studying for school and walked outside to fill the cats water bowl before bed. i looked out into the distance and saw this cylinder like shaped object hovering in the sky. at first i thought it was a planet  because of the size being larger than a typical star. however, after further observation i noticed the object began to sway back and forth then stopped and periodically ascended and descended in a fast motion. i have never seen any plane or helicopter move the way this object had. wondering if any one else saw the same thing. i didn't stay up for more than 1 to 1 1/2 hours after initial sighting to see it disappear. i had continuous sight of the object up until the point when i went to bed around 4:30 or 5:00am. i tried to record the sighting on my phone and it would not pick up on the camera.
content.summary: Shaped like a cylinder emitted blue red white lights with red ring aura hovered with periodic ascending and descending

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for me to return to our vehicle, my husband began to observe this bright red-orange object coming from the direction of the ocean (east coast of florida). as i joined him in the car i noticed he had his driver's side door open and was standing outside of the car looking up, then i asked what he was looking at and began to look up, too. this bright red-orange oval or roundish rectangular object was passing high above us moving slowly in the direction of the less-than-half-moon that was out on this very clear, cloudless night, tonight. i said, "what is that?" and he said he had no idea. we are former journalists and now also continue to work in a field involving great powers of observation and ability to describe accurately what we see. and neither of us has ever observed anything that we could not reasonably identify before. the object began to slow and almost becoming stationary, start to flicker as its glowing red-orange light began to disappear, as if it were turning sharp left - as if we had been observing the 'broadside' of the object. i shot video of it with my cell phone which captured the unique color of the object, shows it moving toward the moon, slowing, and flickering to a state where it was no longer able to be observed, as if it were turning, and then, it simply disappeared. had it not disappeared that way, we probably would have thought it was some kind of aircraft, though an unknown aircraft to both of us. but it moved too slowly, behaved too strangely, and had a color completely new to both of us. when it disappeared the way it did, we both realized we had probably seen something quite special. we are hoping we are not the only ones to have seen it.
content.summary: Two witnesses observed bright red-orange object traveling from east (ocean) heading west-southwest toward moon, then before passing front of moon it slowed, almost hovering and began to disappear while appearing to turn sharp left and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 13, 2012, i witnessed a silver circular object hovering in the sky during broad daylight. the object was stationary for at least 10 minutes and then disappeared. 

i noticed the object when i was walking back from my car.

i had no idea what the object was.

the object just hovered in the sky. it was at least a mile away.

i had no real feelings about this. i just kept looking.

the object disappeared into thin air. it was there one second and then gone.
content.summary: Silver object seen in sky

content.detailedDescription:
On may 13, 2012, i witnessed a silver circular object hovering in the sky during broad daylight. the object was stationary for at least 10 minutes and then disappeared.

i had no real feelings about this. i just kept looking.

the object disappeared into thin air. it was there one second and then gone.
content.summary: Silver object seen in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the eifel tower restuarant with my new wife and our wedding party on june 22, 2012 at roughly 7:45pm. the sky was perfectly clear with no clouds, and the sun was beginning to set. 

i noticed an object in the sky that didnt look right. it appeared to be stationary and showed little movement for over 5 minutes. when i first saw it i assumed it was a rocket in the distance but as time lapsed and it didnt move i began to think it may be something other than military.

my party continued to watch until after a short period the object began to rise in the sky slowly at first and then accelerate. we watched it until it disappeared.
content.summary: Object hovered in sky for 5+ minutes then accelerated straight up

content.detailedDescription: It was approx. 9:20 to 9:30p.M. i was outdoors getting my dogs in the house for the night looking at the sky while waiting for them to come in. i noticed an object originally thinking it was a brillant sparkling star, but not many stars were in view yet & it started moving extremely fast & was sparkling bright. it went to the se horizon & just dissapeared. i thought at first it must have disappeared in cloud cover but didn't think there were any clouds. i kept looking around & it apeared again in a different location, but still eastward, then went across the sky a short distance & disappeared again. i seen it approx. 3 or 4 times then ran in the house to get my husband. he came quickly but we didn't see anything for a few minutes, although noticed a helicopter in the same area now. beale af base it not far from our location. a few minutes later it appeared again overhead moving extremely fast toward the se again & disappeared. it appeared to resemble a very brillant star, shape, size etc. no trails, sounds, beams or other noticable features, just a very fast moving, disappearing starlike object. shortly after the sightings there were a couple planes in that area but the object appeared to be gone or disappeared from view. my thoughts are nothing moves, looks or disappears & reappears in different locations like that.
content.summary: Starlike lights disappearing several times & reappearing in various locations.

content.detailedDescription: Three generations of one family (witnesses from youngest to oldest g1, g2, and g3) live in the house at the location of the circle in greenville, va. witness g1 notified his mother (witness g2) on monday 18-jun-2012 that there was a grey circle in the backyard. witness g2 sent a text message monday 18-jun-2012 to her friend (witness s1) in stuarts draft, va about the circle. witness s1 and her husband (witness s2) went to greenville, va on tuesday 19-jun-2012 to view the circle and took two pictures (see attached pictures greenville1.Jpg and greenville2.Jpg). witness s2 contacted rob swiatek of mufon, and rob swiatek recommended soil samples be taken that day due to impending rain. during a second visit on tuesday 19-jun-2012 to greenville, va, witness s2 took four soil samples as suggested by rob swiatek and took measurements of the circle which was approximately 11 feet in diameter with the grey ring around the circle having a width of approximately 5.5 inches. during the tuesday 19-jun-2012 visits to greenville, all five witnesses were present at the site of the circle. during a subsequent visit to the site on sunday 24-jun-2012 by mufon fi don braffitt and witness s2, the circle was still visible in the grass, and more detailed measurements and pictures were taken. unfortunately no additional soil or vegetation samples were obtained sunday 24-jun-2012 because the homeowner (witness g3) asked mufon and witness s2 to leave the property before any additional samples could be taken.
content.summary: 11 foot diameter circle in grass with 5.5 inch wide grey ring

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out by my pool in my back yard. i had gotten out of the pool and was laying on the concrete on my back. this is when i noticed the object. at first i thought it was a plane. but then i noticed that the color was an illuminated sort of white almost transparent like color. i've never seen a plane that looked like that. so i continued to watch it. oh it was more like a triangle shape too. it seemed to be going very fast. it crossed quite a distance in a short amount of time. it was also very high in the sky so that it looked small. i don't really know how big it was. i've never seen a plane that high before either. it also didn't leave a trail like planes do. there was no sound either. i was saying to myself what the hell is that. i was pretty excited. then the object just disappeared right before my eyes.
content.summary: Observed a triangle shape very high inthe sky. kinda looked transparent and white in color. traveled quite a distance in a short amount of time. it disappeared right before my eyes in daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
two friends of mine and i saw a helicopter leaving the salem airport, heading from south-west north, making a wide turn towards south-east.  went back in the house and could hear the same helicopter, getting louder(assuming it had decided to go north once more).  considered this to be strange, so i went back outside to see what was going on.  mind you, i watch military helicopters, air traffic and planes spraying chemtrails daily; what i saw that night was undoubtedly irregular, to say the least.
     there were two orbs about the size of our perception of the stars, though you could tell they were close.  one was red and one was white, opaque, moving in a steady line from south to north, almost directly over 440 lancaster dr.
     at about 100ft.(give or take), it seemed as though the same helicopter was being towed by the orbs, as it was about ten feet from the orbs, matching their speed, though slightly wobbling, giving the impression that it was being pulled.
     what my friend described as a "wafer-like craft", pulsating white light in a circular pattern around the craft, followed the helicopter about five minutes behind.  it was too low and too quiet to be an airplane or helicopter, and was reflective in nature.  it sustained a straight line and speed, going from south-west to north until it disappeared over the apartments.
     my friends and i continued to watch the sky for a whole hour, witnessing a "star", heading south from north, this time appearing as though it had much more altitude.  it sustained a straight line and red light, flashing white and disappearing.  then two more orbs, racing each other from north-west to north-east, until they too disappeared.  the one on the left sped past the right one, and the two disappeared.  finally, another occurence...Only that time, it was a single white orb, moving from north-east to south-east before disappearing.

it seems the valley is incredibly popular this time around.
content.summary: High traffic above lancaster dr.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i had went outside to smoke......2 out of our 6 children followed. the girls noticed these lights flying back and forth moving quickly, faster than any plane or jet. the girls pointed this out n then my husband pointed them out to me. i could not believe what i was seeing. these lights moved so quickly and would just disappear then reappear in completely different areas. the turns they made impossible for a plane, way to much movement to b a meteor falling from the sky. 
   then, as my husband and i are watching this one light move through the sky it vanishes the reappears about a foot away and starts to become very bright. it begins to fade just a hair then gets so bright it was as if someone was bringn a lightbulb straight at our faces. i had goosbumps and was ready to run. one again, it just disappeared. 
   as we were discussing what had just happened my step daughter had mentioned something as she was walking back into the house. after we had seen that bright light n then witness it vanish with out a trace, all the dogs around our home started to bark. i had thought this myself but didnt want to say anything, she did though n it was odd but i figured i was being silly compared to what we had just witnessed. 
   these things had looked like normal stars, until that one had become extremely bright that is. i dont believe in this sort of stuff and try to ignore all the hub bub about it but after that night...Im a little creeped out. i live in southern illinois and nothing like that happens round here....We were all a little wierded out, especially when they just disappeared without a trace. now i look for them every night to try to make sense of this.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: These lights kept flying around n back the got very bright and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Report test - delete as informational only
content.summary: Report test - delete as informational only

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the car and i heard a "tshhhhhhhhhhhhhhh" kind of noise. when i looked up toward the sky there was what i originally thought to be an airplane flying really low. when my eyes adjusted to the dark i noticed it wasnt an airplane. i had scrambled for my phone to take a picture but when i looked up and blinked it was there for a split second then 'blinked out' like it was never there to begin with.

the craft/object was far down enough that i could see what looked like to be windows on the side of a stubby butterfly shaped thing. there were 7 main lights on the bottom of the object and several smaller lights on the sides. what would have been the wings of the butterfly shape were dark almost black, the v-shaped middle piece was a light, almost silver color, and what i interpreted as a door, shaped like a triangle at the inside of the v.

the attatched sketch is from a more underside view.
content.summary: Dark butterfly shaped main silhouette, lighter chevron-like inner shape. 7 main lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was after a ufo conference in toronto. i drove guest home to where they had reported to me sightings of strange lights traversing the sky in the previous nights. on arriving at her place of residency i was taken to the back yard. within 5 minutes a bright large white light appeared in the night sky round in appearance. it increased in brightness until it almost reached the brightness of a welders arc. the time of exposure was 4 seconds before it just went out much like someone had turned a light switch off only to reappear again with half it's original brightness, and lasting another 4 seconds. this pulsating action continued for about 30 seconds as the object moved away from us. at arms length the object was the size of a silver dollar.
 the following evening, michelle reported to me an illuminated orb flying high over her head as she was letting the cat out. it was explained to me that the object did a "power up" followed by another bright light that crossed the sky at a fast pace.
content.summary: Asked for a ufo sighting. recieved a ufo sighting again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a teenager living in geneva switzerland. we lived in a 16 story apartment at the top. my bedroom window looked out over mt. blanc and the alps. i had severe insomnia so as usual i was awake around 11:30 every night.  i was in bed, and heard an unusual dull roar or rumble so i sat up and looked out the window. my immediate reaction was "oh no, there goes italy" because what looked to be a huge meteor followed by a smaller one was crossing the sky and went down behind mt. blanc. 
nothing happened.  no explosion, no bye bye italy. i looked all through the newspapers and tv news the next day and nothing was mentioned.  that next evening i was laying in bed as usual and was remembering what i had seen the night before.  at the same time of night, i again heard the same dull roar, again sat up and watched the exact same orange fireball with the smaller one behind it take the same trajectory across the sky and go down behind mt. blanc.  when i saw it both times it was going from the alps over near the "aiguilles du midi" or past there,heading se towards mt blanc and went down behind this tallest alpine peak.
one thing that has become of further interest to me is that a family member who was at that time very high in us government dealing with aviation and airspace matters came to visit us.  he was doing a conference in geneva. this was very soon after my sighting. he came into my bedroom the morning of the conference and asked me if i believed in ufo's.  he then proceeded to show me some photos the gov't was looking into.  he said he was a part of this and part of his job was to question air force pilots who had seen them.
i am not at all sure of the month or year this happened as it was a long time ago. it seemed to be summer as i don't remember snow or heavy coats around.
i've come to think the timing of that was interesting.  i also think it is interesting that orange fireballs are now being seen in this country.
content.summary: Two orange fireballs, a small one right behind the large one, two nights in a row same time

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bicycle towards potomac yards from crystal city. which is weird after i thought about it because i wasn't going to even head over there.  i planned on going back to my apartment, but something urged me to just go that way so i said what the hell i'll go real quick. as i was 3/4 the way there i was on a small overpass bridge and that's when i looked up and saw the usual planes in final. but this time i saw a metallic disc above the planes usual flight path and it just moved in several directions as to grasp my attention. well it did and then it appeared to move away from me and suddenly it was gone. i don't know if it just zipped away or just disenegrated. i was excited to have seen something that i actually can't explain. i fly a lot and see a lot of traffic in the sky and this wasnt a plane or any other aircraft we know about.
content.summary: Metallic disc less then 10 miles from dc

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was out having a cigarette, after watching a movie with my girlfriend and friend. i saw a bright light that looked like a top, it began to grow brighter, so i called my girlfriend out to view it. than the light began move erratically, that's when my neighbor was walking by and i pointed it out too her, and than it shot up above 500ft in the sky, than began hovering and than it looked like it shot two objects of blue light towards the surface. it appeared to have a tracer to it, leaving two streaks of blue temporally in the sky. afterwards it began to move erratically again from the left to the right until it disappeared. after that i ran up to the apartments next door to grab my other neighbor, when we got back outside we began noticing that there were more of them appearing after the first one left, at least a 5 mile radius of the crafts hovering around. there were different groups of them, doing a multitude of patterns. the main pattern we saw were triangles and squares, approximately twenty to twenty five minutes after getting my neighbor, he pointed out a red orb that appeared from the south east towards the oregon city/carver area. the orb began flickering a bright red light, as it appeared to "dance" in a zig zag pattern intercepting the various patterns as it went. after that orb disappeared towards the n/ne, approximately ten minutes after that, the square patterns began rotating from square to line, square to line and than began glowing red. afterwards we grew tired but they remained in the sky, all four of us were extremely nervous but not exactly frightened. as of right now at three of us are still a little rattled from what we saw, and can still picture the blue lights. currently my adrenaline levels are still on high, and so is my neighbors.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Late night, multiple objects witnessed at once, by three or more people.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving home from los alamos going north on hwy 84,heading towards espanola, in the middle of the santa clara pueblo. i saw an orb on the left horizon,tree top level, moving quickly in a straight line, with my car. i could not say how far away it was, or how large it was.It moved like this for 5 to6 seconds, then shot downwards in front of us on the left side at an angle so fast-it created a trail. we thought it must have crashed,because it was so close to the ground. when we reached the area that we assumed it had crashed, nothing was there.
afterward. both of us marveled at how calm we were and how we did not question the event while it was happening.
content.summary: A giant glowing pearl shape with a tail when it descended instantly...

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving down nokesville rd in bristow, virginia on november 10, 2011 around 12:30am. she was in a separate car right in-front of me, we were on our cell-phones talking to each other, when all of a sudden, a very huge green spherical object started descending from the sky and eventually disappeared into the low tree-line, no noise, no impact felt.

 we judged the object to be as big as a large-size 2 story house and approximately less than 300ft from us. it was moving slow, it was not a shooting star, a plane or helicopter. there was no noise.The middle part of the object was not bright or glowing bright like the green halo that surrounded it, i could see some detail like green flame igniting around the object.I could also look at the center of the object as it was not a bright light like comets or shooting stars, it was actually quite dim, and i'd say the middle of the object could have been either metallic or rock, i remember it looking quite smooth.

there was also another vehicle in front of us that witnessed this object.
content.summary: Huge green fireball/orb slowly descending from the sky

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were sitting on my porch talking when a bright light in the sky caught our eye, it was a long and quite large cigar shaped ufo, it was glowing a bright yellow color. ive never seen anything before with that shape or size.  it was traveling at such a fast speed as well. it was such a amazing sight and well never forget it.
content.summary: It was a cigar shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
It was nine thirty at night and i was outside on my back patio. i have made it a habit to watch the sky and the treelines with my digital nightvision monocular.. i like to observe the wonders of the universe and with nv you can see stars that you normally cannot.  i was scanning the north when i heard the roar of what i knew to be a fighter jet.  we have a big usaf base here and i have gotten used to seeing and hearing various jet fighter aircraft.  
so i am scanning the sky trying to find the strobes on the fighter jet i am hearing when i pan to the left, which is west, and notice a very bright star.  i continue panning to my left.. looking south.. then i move back to my right because it has become obvious to me that the sound cannot be in that direction. as i do i notice that that bright star isn't exactly where it was before.  i must admit that it is surreal when something that your mind has acknowledged as staionary suddenly isn't.  the things was moving..Or so i thought it was... so i moved close to my privacy fence gate and lined up the object with a stationary reference point to see if it was indeed moving.. it was... i grabbed my droid and selected pictures at 4x zoom. i shot six images through the digital night vision device as i watched in awe as this huge white "thing" - which by now obviously wasn't a star - slowly ease across the sky..Totally silent which only added to the extreme creepiness of the situation.
it moved towards me (easterly direction) then made a gentle 90 degree arc moving south.  i kept it in my viewfinder when suddenly it was gone.  i could not reacquire it.  it just vanished.
i wanted to go and grab the wife, pull her outside and show it to her but i was afraid she wouldn't see it or maybe it would be gone any second.. or maybe disturbing her while she's watching tv wouldn't be a prudent thing to do..<g>
content.summary: Brightly lit star began moving, flew overhead in gradual arc turned south then disappeared

content.summary: Brightly lit star began moving, flew overhead in gradual arc turned south then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
It was nine thirty at night and i was outside on my back patio. i have made it a habit to watch the sky and the treelines with my digital nightvision monocular.. i like to observe the wonders of the universe and with nv you can see stars that you normally cannot.  i was scanning the north when i heard the roar of what i knew to be a fighter jet.  we have a big usaf base here and i have gotten used to seeing and hearing various jet fighter aircraft.  
so i am scanning the sky trying to find the strobes on the fighter jet i am hearing when i pan to the left, which is west, and notice a very bright star.  i continue panning to my left.. looking south.. then i move back to my right because it has become obvious to me that the sound cannot be in that direction. as i do i notice that that bright star isn't exactly where it was before.  i must admit that it is surreal when something that your mind has acknowledged as staionary suddenly isn't.  the things was moving..Or so i thought it was... so i moved close to my privacy fence gate and lined up the object with a stationary reference point to see if it was indeed moving.. it was... i grabbed my droid and selected pictures at 4x zoom. i shot six images through the digital night vision device as i watched in awe as this huge white "thing" - which by now obviously wasn't a star - slowly ease across the sky..Totally silent which only added to the extreme creepiness of the situation.
it moved towards me (easterly direction) then made a gentle 90 degree arc moving south.  i kept it in my viewfinder when suddenly it was gone.  i could not reacquire it.  it just vanished.
i wanted to go and grab the wife, pull her outside and show it to her but i was afraid she wouldn't see it or maybe it would be gone any second.. or maybe disturbing her while she's watching tv wouldn't be a prudent thing to do..<g>
content.summary: Brightly lit star began moving, flew overhead in gradual arc turned south then disappeared
